data.name: AssociateObligation
data.value: update CKT_OBLIGATION set CSP_P_NUMBER = @cspPNumber where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OB_ID = @obId) and (DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadObligation1
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, CSP_P_NUMBER from CKT_OBLIGATION where (@dtyGeneratedId = DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OB_ID = @obId)

data.name: ReadObligation2
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, CSP_P_NUMBER from CKT_OBLIGATION where (@dtyGeneratedId = DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OB_ID = @obId)

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CD, DEBT_TYP_NM, DEBT_TYP_CLASS, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT, SUP_PRSN_REQ_IND from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_CD = @debtTypCd
